name: Green Knight
description:
This game was made in 48 hours for the Ludum Dare 35 compo. The theme was 'Shapeshift'.

The game is about a knight who went to slay an evil wizard, who during their fight transformed the knight into a bird. The knight managed to escape and now seeks for a rematch. For some reason the spell didn't do the trick completely and the knight constantly shifts between bird and human forms.

INSTRUCTIONS:

Arrows - move
X - jump/fly
C - attack
(down attack = down key + C while jumping)

tip: the bird can attack too
